page.title: 10Landscape Around Holmfirth
page.content: The landscape around Holmfirth mainly consists of{valleys and hills.}Most of the area is made up of{fields and {small communities.}There are a number of cities near Holmfirth which are easy to get to like Manchester, Sheffield,Wakefield and Leeds.The nearest major town to Holmfirth is Huddersfield.Around Holmfirth there are a lot of{farms.}Because Holmfirth is in the{Pennines}the area around the town is very hilly so there are plenty of pleasant picturesque views over the Holme Valley.Many of the fields around Holmfirth are used for{grazing cattle. Around places like Holme there are forests which usually surround the {reservoirs.}Also around Holme there are moors on which{sheep}graze.On the moors there is the border between West Yorkshire and Derbyshire which is just over the Pennines from Holmfirth.
